long_description:
If 'query_set' is set to query the trigger settings will be queried and
left unchanged.

Requires a CONNECTION_DS1074Z node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible DS1000Z oscilloscopes
short_description: The TRIGGER_DS1074Z node changes the trigger settings for the DS1074Z.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DS1074Z node).

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Which channel to use as the trigger channel.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Set the triggering level, in Volts

parameters.name: slope
parameters.description: Which slope to detect the triggering time on.

parameters.name: coupling
parameters.description: Which coupling to use for the trigger signal.
